faq_list.question: What can you do?
faq_list.answer:
As Artisan's AI assistant, I can help with many aspects of outbound sales:

1. Lead discovery and research using our database of over 300 million B2B contacts
2. Drafting personalized cold emails using AI-powered playbooks
3. Managing email campaigns and optimizing deliverability
4. Providing analytics on campaign performance
5. Automating routine sales tasks to free up your team's time

I'm here to streamline your entire outbound process. What specific area would you like help with?

faq_list.question: Do you take care of email warm up?
faq_list.answer:
Yes, Artisan has a built-in email warmup feature to protect your domain reputation and improve deliverability. Here's how it works:

1. We gradually increase email volume over about 3 weeks
2. Our AI sends positive interactions to dummy accounts to balance cold outreach
3. We monitor your mailbox health score and adjust sending limits dynamically
4. The warmup process continues even after the initial period to maintain reputation

This helps ensure your cold emails reach inboxes instead of spam folders. Would you like more details on our warmup process?

faq_list.question: Will my CRMs be automatically synced if a lead responds to my email?
faq_list.answer:
Artisan integrates with popular CRMs like Salesforce and HubSpot to export engaged leads. While full automatic syncing isn't mentioned, we do offer:

1. The ability to export leads who have engaged with your campaigns
2. Integration to prevent reaching out to contacts already in your CRM
3. A daily email summary of all responses you've received

For the most up-to-date information on our CRM integration capabilities, I'd recommend speaking with our sales team. Would you like me to arrange that for you?

faq_list.question: I need some help setting up my campaign.
faq_list.answer:
Of course! I'd be happy to guide you through setting up your campaign. Here's a quick overview of the process:

1. Define your target customer persona (industries, job titles, company size, etc.)
2. Create your campaign pitch (company info, features, pain points, proof points)
3. Choose campaign settings (language, email signature, calendar link, tone of voice)
4. Select an AI Playbook for email writing style
5. Activate your campaign

Would you like to start with defining your target customer persona, or is there a specific part of the setup you need help with?

faq_list.question: Where does Ava find leads?
faq_list.answer: We work with a number of industry-leading data providers to give Ava access to the most accurate and valuable B2B data through advanced AI-powered automation. You dont need to have your own data source - everything is built into our AI sales platform, enhancing the efficiency of your sales teams.

faq_list.question: Who does Ava send emails as?
faq_list.answer: Ava impersonates you, sending emails using your email address. Leveraging generative AI, she incorporates on-brand messaging to sound like you and your salespeople, ensuring your sales teams can maintain consistency and optimize communications.

faq_list.question: Can Ava respond to emails too?
faq_list.answer: This functionality is currently in beta and will roll out more widely soon! Right now, you can ask Ava to draft responses for you within the Inbox. She also leverages AI-powered automation to follow-up with leads, helping streamline your sales activities.

faq_list.question: Can Ava do outreach on LinkedIn?
faq_list.answer: This feature is currently being built! Soon, Ava will help capture more of the sales cycle by automating outreach on LinkedIn and other social media platforms. This will include sending connection requests, messages, and more to boost your conversion rate and streamline your sales activities.

faq_list.question: Can Ava make phone calls?
faq_list.answer: Were currently building our Dialer so your salespeople can do cold calling and outreach through our platform! Ava will be able to listen in, take notes in real-time, and streamline your workflow with automated follow-up phone calls during your sales calls.

faq_list.question: What's the pricing to hire Ava?
faq_list.answer: Our pricing is variable based on the lead volume and customization you need. Ava leverages the power of AI to enhance lead generation, improve conversion rates, and help close deals efficiently. For a pricing consultation and to learn how Ava can contribute to your sales enablement, please reach out to our sales team.

faq_list.question: How does Artisan pricing work?
faq_list.answer: Artisan is priced based on the volume of leads you are doing outreach to. We can split this between BDR & AE seats as required.

faq_list.question: We have specific security requirements that are not covered on your site - can you accommodate them?
faq_list.answer: Yes! Reach out to our sales team and we can work with you to scope your specific requirements and ensure Artisan is set up and used in a compliant way.

faq_list.question: What kind of support do you offer?
faq_list.answer: We offer white glove support as standard. We will work closely with you through the onboarding process, you will have a dedicated account manager, and for larger customers we can set up a direct connection via Slack or Teams.

faq_list.question: Im an existing customer, how do I access the new pricing packages?
faq_list.answer: Reach out to your Artisan account executive, who can do a full walkthrough of the new packages and create a customized proposal for you.

faq_list.question: Does Ava Work for B2C Leads?
faq_list.answer: You can use Ava for B2C email campaigns, but it does require extra input on your part. Right now, Avas database exclusively features B2B leads. If youre using Ava for a B2C email campaign, youll need to upload your own spreadsheet populated with the necessary information to generate email copy. You can learn how to do this here: https://support.artisan.co/en/articles/9191308-how-do-i-upload-a-csv-file-of-my-own-leads. We're working hard to introduce new features to our platform and hope to add B2C leads into Avas database soon!
